name: Raven Fantasy - RPG Icons, Pixel Art Icons, Textures and Sprites - Expanded Skills and Status
name_original: Raven Fantasy - RPG Icons, Pixel Art Icons, Textures and Sprites - Expanded Skills and Status
description:
< GO BACK TO MY STORE

This is a Big icon pack with 800+ icons, this pack covers the following:

  • Status and Conditions.
  • Physical and Elemental Skills.
  • Class Skills.

This asset was funded using Patreon revenue and made with the fantastic artist Manowell. 

Join us on Patreon to get all my assets for free, and help me fund assets like this one and participate in design decisions. :)

Features and Rights: 1- All sprites come in 16x16, 32x32, and 64x64 with a dark outline.

2- Classic 16x16 Pixel art style, which can match most RPGs.

3- 16 square grid ready to use a sprite sheet, with the perfect size to increase compatibility with RPG Maker MV, and MZ.

4- Not only in a "sprite sheet" but all images will come too in separate png files.

5- A color palette document included with a download link that belongs to Kerrie Lake and is named Resurrect 64.

6- This asset can be modified to match any of your needs. This asset can be used in any commercial and physical project (print or tabletop). Still, it cannot be distributed or sold as an individual product without the creator's permission (me).

7- Attribution is not necessary but welcome. And if you use it in any project ill be happy to have a link or (and) a copy :)

8- For more detailed licensing information: License Get this asset and a lot of others for free with our: Patreon, Already a Patreon Download for free: Here

Freebies: Click here to see and get our free assets!

See Also:

If you have any questions or suggestions, please do so below in the comments for me to add and change them, in the following updates and upcoming products!
